name: ADev
short_description:
A lightweight Android development tool.  Wraps the Android SDK's Ant tool,
and command line tools 'android' and 'adb'.

Integrated JDWP debugger. 

- Runs on Windows and Linux, but has not been thoroughly tested on the Mac.

- Supports Gradle:
clean, assembleDebug, assembleRelease, uninstallDebug, uninstallRelease, installDebug, installRelease

- Supports the NDK:
    'ndk-build clean' (Clean) and 'ndk-build' (Build)

- Supports creation of Android Ant, or Gradle projects.

- Use your favorite editor.

- Fast development cycle to build, load and debug your application on the Emulator or your Android device.

Menu options for:
Create   (android create project/lib-project ...)
Update  (android update project/lib-project ...)

Logcat:  Color highlighting for warning and error
messages with filter options to block unwanted tags.

Pull Files:  Pull files from the Emulator or your device's SD card.
